description:
Data, queries and RESTXQ scripts to:

  • Create the database
  • Show basic information
  • Create a subset based on number of sentence elements
  • List lemmata of the subset
  • For lemma, list relations
  • For relation of lemma, list all sentences where it occurs
  • Also, a set of syntactic queries for various combinations of POS and relations
title: nevenjovanovic/greek-complexity: First set of queries (number of elements, lemmata, relations)
